title: ESSENCE COLLECTOR WARD SKIN IS GONE
body: Hey, I purchased this ward skin at the beginning of preseason. Now when I go to select a ward skin it is not there anymore???

replies.body: No worries about this essence collector ward! I've been able to check your account and see it still there, but it seems like it's not showing up in lobby for anyone (even me -_-'). We're still working on getting that to show back up!
